meeting_info.location: Dallas City Hall, 6FN Conference Room and Videoconference

agenda_items.title: Cotton Belt Trail
agenda_items.description: Authorize settlement in lieu of proceeding with condemnation, of a hike and bike trail easement from AV Prestonwood Trails, LLC of approximately 14,454 square feet (0.33 acres) of land located at 6350 Keller Springs Road for the Cotton Belt Trail Project — Not to exceed $3,500.00, increased from $17,500.00 ($14,500.00 plus closing costs and title expenses not to exceed $3,000.00) to $21,000 ($18,000, plus closing costs and title expenses not to exceed $3,000).

agenda_items.title: Klyde Warren Park
agenda_items.description: Authorize (1) an Interlocal Agreement between the City of Dallas and Dallas County, for the purposes of improving land for park purposes and for the maintenance, development, operation, and expansion of Klyde Warren Park; (2) an increase in appropriations in the amount of $250,000.00 in the Woodall Rodgers Development Fund; (3) the receipt and deposit in the amount of $250,000.00 from Dallas County in the Woodall Rodgers Development Fund; (4) to disburse funds in an amount not to exceed $250,000.00; and (5) execution of the Interlocal Agreement including all terms, conditions, and documents required by the agreement - Not to exceed $250,000.00.

agenda_items.title: Planning & Construction Project Update: Horizontal & Facilities

financial_items.description: Settlement for Cotton Belt Trail Project
Increase in appropriations for Klyde Warren Park
